name: Rethinking token incentives for consumer adoption
description:
The current incentive systems for many applications and ecosystems in crypto are naive and will not extend to mainstream consumer adoption.

We will talk through a new framework to help projects think about how to appeal to mainstream users and share some examples for how we are using it at Icebreaker (eg getting people to run without monetary incentives). 

We might even do a live demonstration :)

https://mirror.xyz/icebreakerlabs.eth/xDKxKWdxiBn7waxTq9o-LaQi2UhkSO1g3xrqJRtft3Y
